info.author: Christopher Auyeung
info.description: Bones adds an additional "controller" layer ontop of the url, view, as Django does not enforce the MVC pattern. Bones provides a base controller that can be extended for your usage. It enforces a parse, process, render function flow.
info.keywords: bones, controller, mvc, parse, process, request, render, foundation

info.name: django_bones
info.html_description: Bones adds an additional “controller” layer ontop of the url, view, as Django does not enforce the MVC pattern. Bones provides a base controller that can be extended for your usage. It enforces a parse, process, render function flow.
